properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the task object for lookup

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: success
properties.description: Whether the task's completion was successful

properties.name: filters
properties.description: The starting time of the range. Tasks created or completed at or after this time will be included.

properties.name: to
properties.description: The ending time of the range. Defaults to current time if not specified.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Completion Notes

properties.name: recipientNotes
properties.description: Override the recipient notes for this task only

properties.name: recipientSkipSMSNotifications
properties.description: Whether to override the recipient notification settings for this task

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Clone an Onfleet task

properties.name: Complete
properties.description: Force-complete a started Onfleet task

properties.name: Create
properties.description: Create a new Onfleet task

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete an Onfleet task

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a specific Onfleet task

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many Onfleet tasks

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update an Onfleet task

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the recipient for lookup

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone of the recipient for lookup

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to skip validation for this recipient's phone number

properties.name: Get Delegatee Details
properties.description: Retrieve the details of an organization with which you are connected

properties.name: Get Schedule
properties.description: Get a specific Onfleet worker schedule

properties.name: Update Tasks
properties.description: Fully replace a container's tasks

properties.name: Get Time Estimates
properties.description: Get estimated times for upcoming tasks for a team, returns a selected driver
